mod.description:
Requires a Galaxy Reset for best experience. Tweaks how solar systems generate to make a realistic distribution of worlds, and increases the amount of worlds per system.
Special variants of the mod exist to further define system generation.
Please note all of these options are mutually exclusive, choose ONLY ONE!

component.description:
Default version of the mod. Adjusts planet counts to realistic levels by increasing the maximum amount of planets in a star system to 11, adjusting the likelihood of moons, gas giants, and rings, and reducing spawns of High T-Score planets!
This is the closest this mod gets to a Vanilla+ Experience!
Same as Vanilla+, but the size of the Grox has been severely reduced.
Same as Vanilla+, but the size of the Grox has been even further reduced.
Same as Vanilla+, but the Grox may not spawn.
A Special Variation of the mod that swaps around the values for easter-egg planets and barren planets, making those easter eggs extremely common (Severely OP).

A Variation of the mod where you took ages to evolve and as such life is extremely abundant, completely changes how you approach Space Stage.
Makes Empires Very Common

Same as Special: Cramped Galaxy, except it's now extremely cramped.
Makes Empires Exceedingly Common

A Variation of the mod where life is extremely sparse, completely changes how you approach Space Stage.
Makes Empires Rare

A Variation of the mod where you were amongst the first to evolve, completely changes how you approach Space Stage.
Makes Empires Exceedingly Rare (Extremely Difficult)

Same as Special: Progenitor, except no empires outside of the Grox exist!
Completely eliminates Alien Empires (Excluding The Grox) from the game! (Good Luck)

Same as Special: Progenitor, except absolutely no empires exist!
Completely eliminates Alien Empires (Including The Grox) from the game! (Good Luck)
